pages.text: NAILNTU AI & Language GroupMy research interests lie in the intersection of artificial intelligence and natural language processing with the focus on applications of natural language understanding, semantics, question & answering, information extraction and knowledge construction, sentiment analysis, and recommendation systems.Demo page

pages.title: publication
